title: chroma skins on new champion select
body: the champion select is cool. however when choosing skins the skin is displayed as the poster image for that skin. there is a lack of an option when to choose what chroma skin to wear. this happened to me while playing lee sin. i wanted to use dragonfist lee sin duel but instead had to play with regular dragonfist lee sin. please fix the issue. thank you .  rp rewards welcome

replies.body:
Hey luishernandez,

This is a known issue with the new champion select. There's a similar issue regarding ward skin selection. These issues should be resolved next patch.
Same happened to me, trying to play with cass
